messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1631
messages.msgSnippet: Hank s pals are here, too. Pete, the cat =&= ... From: Julie Stauffer To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, November 28, 2001 10:57 PM
messages.messageBody:
Hank's pals are here, too.
Pete, the cat =&=
~~~~~~~~~~~

----- Original Message -----
From: Julie Stauffer
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 28, 2001 10:57 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1631


<<Can we expect this sort of comment each time>>

Oh good lord! Here we go again........

Once again, people who post what I am thinking get jumped on by Hank and I
figure Drover will be showing up here shortly

Julie
